00009     def eval(self, pop=None):
00010         if not pop:
00011             pop = self.pop
00012 
00013         evalsets = []
00014         for i in xrange(len(pop)):
00015             subpop = pop[i]
00016             permset = []
00017             for j in xrange(self.permutations):
00018                 self.params.random.shuffle(subpop)
00019                 permset.extend(subpop)
00020             evalsets.append(permset)
00021 
00022         print "%.2f" % 0.0,
00023         sys.stdout.flush()
00024         numevals = self.popsize*self.permutations
00025         for i in xrange(numevals):
00026             evalset = []
00027             for subset in evalsets:

00032             sys.stdout.flush()

00035     def selectParent(self, pop):
00036         return self.selectfunc(pop, self.params.random)
00037 
00038     def combinepop(self, newPop):
00039         for i in xrange(len(self.pop)):
00040             self.pop[i] = self.combinepopfunc(self.pop[i], newPop[i])

00042     def nextgen(self):
00043         newpop = []
00044         for subpop in self.pop:
00045             newsubpop = []
00046             for i in xrange(0, self.popsize, 2):
00047                 p1 = self.selectParent(subpop)
00048                 p2 = self.selectParent(subpop)
00049                 c1, c2 = self.params.crossover(p1, p2)
00050                 self.params.mutate(c1)
00051                 self.params.mutate(c2)
00052                 newsubpop.append(c1)
00053                 newsubpop.append(c2)
00054             newpop.append(newsubpop)
00055         self.eval(newpop)
00056         self.params.app.scaleFitness(newpop)
00057         self.combinepop(newpop)
